title: Google Books Search
description: A full stack MERN app, serving users with the list of books against their queries, users can save books, view them and delete them.
tools: Javascript, React, Node, Express, Axios, MongoDB, Mongoose ORM, Heroku

title: New York Times Articles Scraping
description: A user-friendly app that srapes articles from New York Times website and stores them, mainly into links, which can be viewed later
tools: Javascript, Handlebars, MySQL, Node, Express, Axios, Sequelize ORM, Heroku

title: React Clicky Game
description: Each time a player clicks on an image, all images will shuffle. Once the user clicks on the same image twice, it's game over, starting the game again

title: Liri Node App
description: A command line application, taking terminal commands as parameters and return information about songs, artists, movies and concerts
tools: Javascript, Node, Axios, node-spotify-api, fs, Moment, dotenv
link: This is a command line app

title: Eat-da-Burger
description: A full stack restaaurant app where users can mention the burger they want to eat and add more burgers
tools: Javascript, Handlebars, Node, Express, MySQL Heroku

title: Crystal Collector
description: This app which generates a random number. Users have to click on crystals, add up the hidden numbers to match that random number

title: Giphy Images
description: User-friendly application displaying ten moving images based on users' query, users can download the images and use them
tools: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, Giphy API

title: Train Time
description: An app displaying train times saved by the user
tools: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, Firebase, Moment
